@MlWoo
Tried OMP_NUM_THREADS=8 got the same results as 4 . I'm checking the seq2seq tutorial. According to the administrator, it is not a cluster.

@MlWoo 
Tried OMP_NUM_THREADS=8 got the same results as 4 . I'm checking the seq2seq tutorial. According to the administrator, it is not a cluster.
